attributes.description: This is a rare Buick Century Straight Eight Coupe of 1939 vintage. The vehicle was prepared\restored mechanically, including a R200K engine rebuild, and has been on such recent adventures as a tour of South America !! It was originally from the Bertie Bester collection. Original 320 ci straight eight engine. Twin side mounts are highly unusual in this model but came in handy apparently when attempting to cross the Andes on a breakfast run !!!
attributes.title: 1939 Buick Century Straight 8 Coupe

attributes.description:
At WINGFIELD MOTORS our customer is king!
Before delivery, this vehicle will receive a Multi-point quality inspection before being subjected to an AA DEKRA roadworthiness test.  We will trade in any vehicle on this transaction and ensure you receive a pleasant buying experience.  Finance and Insurance can be arranged from our premises by our highly qualified and experienced staff.  You can be assured of great aftersales service, should this be required.  This vehicle can be delivered country wide at an agreed cost.  Please ask about our optional Mechanical breakdown warranties for your new vehicle.  We also provide optional Service Plans to ensure you do not experience sudden servicing costs.

attributes.description:
Conquer the journey in the all-new, all-conquering, Haval Jolion. It offers a clean, contemporary design Influenced by bold architecture and mastered by modern engineering, the Jolion is a vehicle that embodies intelligent thinking. The Jolion features a powerful yet eco-friendly 1.5 Turbo engine producing 105kw @ 210Nm and a measured 7,5L/100km giving you the best of both worlds.
Highly spec features include:
-	Speed sensitive Electric Power Steering
-	Adjustable steering
-	Electronic Parking Brake
-	Cruise Control
-	17 Inch Alloy Wheels
-	3.5-inch colour instrument cluster
-	Front 12V power outlet
-	Fabric seats
-	Driver seat Manual adjust: 6 directions
-	60:40 split folding rear seats
-	Dual and front Side airbags
-	Child lock
-	ABS + EBD (Electronic Brakeforce Distribution) + BA (Brake Assist)
-	Electronic Stability System (ESC) + Traction Control (TCS)
-	Anti-Roll System (RMI) + Secondary Collision Mitigation (SCM)
-	Hill Assist
-	Tyre pressure monitoring system (TPMS)
-	Rear park distance sensors
-	Driving fatigue detection
-	Keyless entry and Push button start
-	Bluetooth Handsfree and Front, rear dual USB connector
-	10.25-inch multimedia touch display
-	4-speaker system
-	Speed Sensitive Volume Control
-	Electric height-adjusting headlights and follow me home function
-	Daytime running lamps
-	Manual Aircon
-	Standard with 5yr/100 000Km Warranty and 5yr/60 000Km Service Plan
attributes.title: 2022 Haval Jolion 1.5T City
